name: Pigeon Hell
description:
You angered the pigeons, and now they want their revenge. Defeat as many as you can, but don't cause an accident on the road!

Objective: Live long enough to reach the end of the level, Avoid crashing into cars, and beeing attacked by pigeons.

Controls:  A/D for left/right, Click with the mouse to shoot pigeons. Escape loads the menu.

Proof that it was made with bolt: https://imgur.com/a/aPRgzRR

Asset Packs used:

  • Fantasy Skybox Free
  • Low Poly Tree Pack
  • Low Poly Cars
  • Low Poly Brick Houses
  • Bolt
  • Dope Tools
  • Bolt Community plugins
